A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Turbo lasers that arc in space\, bombs that need to be dropped like a B17\, Leia Poppins\, Asshat Luke\, Ray's parents!?\, still no Snoak backstory or reveal...and too many jokes. Not a real Star Wars movie even if it was set in that universe. I'm a huge Star Wars fan but I won't be seeing the next movie because this one sucks so much.
